statements: DELETE FROM pharmaceutical_orders WHERE distributor_name = 'ABC Pharmaceuticals';
DELETE FROM pharmaceutical_orders WHERE order_id = 100 AND distributor_name = 'ABC Pharmaceuticals'
DELETE FROM pharmaceutical_orders WHERE product_name = 'Medicine X'
DELETE FROM orders WHERE shipped = FALSE;
DELETE FROM orders WHERE order_id = 100 AND shipped = TRUE
DELETE FROM shipments WHERE status = 'In Transit' AND shipment_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM shipments WHERE shipment_id = 1001 AND status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM Products WHERE product_name = 'Laptop' AND quantity_available < 10;
